com.io7m.r1.meshes

Class RMeshBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.meshes.RMeshBasic

  • @EqualityReference
public final class RMeshBasic
extends Object

    The type of basic mutable meshes.

    Basic meshes have vertices (of type RMeshBasicVertex that have positions, normals, and UV coordinates.
